title: Crash going into Champion Select
body: Yesterday, I was playing Nemesis Draft, and one of my buddies had crashed during Champion Select but he was last so I didn't want to wait the whole time until he dodged, so i dodged. That I understand I should get the 5 minute wait. Instead, it was a 15 minute wait. Haven't dodged at all for a long time before that. But then today, I am loading into Champion Select on ranked and my client crashes. Makes me wait 30 minutes, and makes me lose -10 LP. How can this be fixed?

replies.body:
Disconnecting during champ select, regardless of reason, will show as a 'dodge' to the server. Continuous dodges will result in both longer wait times each dodge, and a loss of LP in ranked. For full details on this, check out our [queue dodging FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

It sounds like your client may be briefly disconnecting from the server, which would potentially kick you out of a match or event crash your client entirely. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in resolving this. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
